mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods( seller_id, anime_id, category, title, description, start_price, instant_buy_price, auction_status, duration, auction_end_at, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{sellerId}, #{animeId}, #{category}, #{title}, #{description}, #{startPrice}, #{instantBuyPrice}, 'WAIT', #{duration}, #{auctionEndAt}, #{createdAt}, #{createdAt} );
mapper.select: SELECT g.id, anime_id, seller_id, u.nickname as sellerNickName, ta.poster_url as sellerProfileFilePath, category, ta.title as animeTitle, g.title, description, start_price, instant_buy_price, auction_status, g.created_at, auction_end_at, count(*) as wishCount FROM goods g INNER JOIN user u ON u.id = g.seller_id LEFT JOIN wishlist w ON w.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN tmdb_anime ta ON ta.id = g.anime_id and ta.id = u.liked_anime_id1 WHERE g.id = #{goodsId};
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET title = #{title}, anime_id = #{animeId}, category = #{category}, description = #{description}, start_price = #{startPrice}, instant_buy_price = #{instantBuyPrice}, duration = #{duration}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE auction_status = 'WAIT' AND id = #{goodsId} AND deleted_at IS NULL;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods_image ( goods_id, file_path, origin_filename, stored_filename, file_size, sort_order ) VALUES ( #{goodsId}, #{filePath}, #{originFilename}, #{storedFilename}, #{fileSize}, #{sortOrder} )
